titleStmt.title: Heaven upon earth, or, The best friend in the worst of times. Delivered in several sermons by James Janeway, Minister of the Gospel.
titleStmt.author: Janeway, James, 1636?-1674.

editionStmt.edition: The third edition, much corrected and enlarged.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Milbourn for D. Newman, at the Kings-Arms in the Poultry, the corner of Grocers-Alley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: British Library, London, England.
